knowledge.whatIsVerbadoc:
**verbadoc pro europa** is a professional web tool that automatically converts unstructured documents (PDFs, images, invoices, contracts, etc.) into **structured data** for Excel, databases, or enterprise systems.

âœ… 100% Processing in Europe
âœ… Full GDPR Compliance
âœ… Built-in AI Assistant
âœ… Smart Multi-document
âœ… Learns from your corrections
âœ… No persistent storage

knowledge.aiClassification:
**AUTOMATIC CLASSIFICATION:**

The AI visually analyzes your document and identifies its type (invoice, ID card, contract, etc.).

âœ… Detects 15+ document types
âœ… Automatically configures prompt and schema
âœ… Time: 2-5 seconds
âœ… Accuracy: 85-98% depending on type
knowledge.aiValidation:
**SMART VALIDATION:**

Reviews extracted data to detect errors.

**Basic Validation (instant):**
âœ… Empty fields
âœ… Formats (dates, emails, tax IDs)
âœ… Out-of-range values

**Advanced AI Validation (2-3 sec):**

âœ… Visual comparison with document
âœ… Misread OCR detection

knowledge.batch:
**BATCH PROCESSING:**

1. Upload all similar files (up to 50)
2. Configure schema with the first document
3. Click 'Process All'
4. They all get processed automatically!

âœ… Process 100 invoices in minutes
â±ï¸ Time: ~5-8 sec per document
